ing: 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger vanilla flavored vodka
des: "This drink is so refreshing. My girlfriend was serving these at ladies' night and I've been drinking them ever since."
ins: Combine ice, vodka, schnapps, pomegranate juice, simple syrup, and lemon juice in shaker. Shake vigorously to chill.  Pour into martini glass, top with a splash of chilled lemon-lime soda, and garnish glass with a slice of fresh lime.
